Title: Disregards the federal child tax credit in calculating an individual taxpayer's federal adjusted gross income
Summary: Disregards any amount included in an individual taxpayer's federal adjusted gross income as a result of the federal child tax credit for purposes of calculating an individual taxpayer's federal income tax deduction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to disregarding the federal child tax credit for purposes of calculating an individual's federal income tax deduction
